project.title: Predicting Future Sales: What the Data Really Tells (EN/ES)
project.description:
A company is exploring the possibility of expanding its retail network to two new store locations. To support this decision, they want to analyze existing data, specifically the square footage and daily sales of current stores, to predict potential sales performance in the candidate locations.
This short, scenario-based training introduces learners to using Excel’s scatter charts and trendlines to make data-driven sales predictions. It is designed to help users interpret patterns, apply linear forecasting, and gain hands-on experience with practical tools for business analysis.
